decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan (unnumbered, no date), EXISTING-01, EXISTING-02, Flood Risk Matrix (unnumbered, no date). Received 01 June 2016. PROPOSED-01 Rev.B, PROPOSED-02 Rev. B. Received 22 July 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension with front roof windows and a single storey rear extension to the house.
